Class SpriteExtended

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
sk.stuba.fiit.SpriteExtended
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SpriteExtended extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite implements Serializable
An extension of the Sprite class that adds support for a Vector2-based position and synchronizes it with the underlying sprite's position.

This class is also Serializable, making it suitable for use in contexts where objects need to be saved or transferred.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • SpriteExtended

      public SpriteExtended(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
      Constructs a new SpriteExtended from a Texture. Initializes the internal position based on the sprite's current location.
      Parameters:
      texture - the texture for the sprite

    • SpriteExtended

      public SpriteExtended(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite)
      Constructs a new SpriteExtended by copying an existing Sprite. Only copies if MyGame.TESTMODE is false.
      Parameters:
      sprite - the sprite to copy

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(float x, float y)
      Sets the position of the sprite using x and y coordinates. Internally updates the Vector2 position.
      Overrides:
      setPosition in class com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate
      y - the y-coordinate
